name: search
description:
Returns a [paginated](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/rest/v3/intro/#pagination) list of statuses that match a search on name or project.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:**

 *  *Administer projects* [project permission.](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg)
 *  *Administer Jira* [project permission.](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg)

expand.description:
Use [expand](#expansion) to include additional information in the response. This parameter accepts a comma-separated list. Expand options include:

 *  `usages` Returns the project and issue types that use the status in their workflow.

projectId.description: The project the status is part of or null for global statuses.

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

searchString.description: Term to match status names against or null to search for all statuses in the search scope.

statusCategory.description: Category of the status to filter by. The supported values are: `TODO`, `IN_PROGRESS`, and `DONE`.

$ul: **isLast**: Whether this is the last page.
**maxResults**: The maximum number of items that could be returned.
**nextPage**: The URL of the next page of results, if any.
**startAt**: The index of the first item returned on the page.
**total**: Number of items that satisfy the search.
